thread.section_title: the Quin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: location & luxury
thread.title_full: location & luxury - Review of the Quin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: djpi
title: location & luxury
text: We enjoyed our stay at The Quin. The room was small (we are tall people, so it's extra noticeable I think) but lovely. The lobby area is also not large, and not a place to relax, as with some high-end properties. However, the restaurant is very good and the location is really great, with easy access to the subway and great shopping.
